Product Name: NIKE COURT VISION LOW NEXT NATURE MEN'S SHOES WHITE
Description:
Nike Court Vision Low Next NatureMen's ShoesFRESH OFF THE COURT.In love with the classic look of '80s basketball but have a thing for the fast-paced culture of today's game? Meet the Nike Court Vision Low. A classic remixed with at least 20% recycled materials by weight, its crisp upper and stitched overlays keep the soul of the original style. The plush, low-cut collar keeps it sleek and comfortable for your world.Made with at least 20% recycled material by weight.Whenever you see the Nike Sunburst or the name Next Nature (NN), you see one more step on our journey toward zero carbon and zero waste.Using synthetic materials, the design features materials that echo mid-1980s basketball shoes.Padded, low-cut collar looks sleek and feels great while the perforations on the toe and sides add comfort and breathability. More Details 

Perforations on the toe and sides
Rubber outsole

Product Name: Nike Waffle Debut Men's Shoes Brown
Description:
Nike Waffle DebutMen's ShoesRetro running style gets modernized in the Nike Waffle Debut. Era-echoing suede and nylon pair with a modern wedge-shaped midsole for a look that feels fresh, but classic. Of course, we kept our tried, true and trusted Waffle outsole on the bottom to add durable traction and a touch of character to every step.Nylon and soft suede overlays nod to vintage running roots while textile underlays add durability.Swoosh logos wrap around your heels to form pull tabs, adding aesthetic appeal to on-and-off functionality.Plush foam midsole gives you elevated look and all-day comfort.Rubber Waffle outsole adds durable traction and heritage style. Product Name: PUMA Softride Flex Slip-On Knit Men's Shoes Black
Description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTIONS
PUMA's SOFTRIDE technology represents an advancement in footwear comfort. It incorporates our softest foam, designed to deliver extreme cushioning that promotes sustained comfort throughout the day. The SOFTRIDE midsole, softer and lighter than traditional EVA, extends through the full length of the shoe. This innovative construction enhances the wearer's experience, providing lightweight support during daily activities.

Step in everyday to comfort and performance to a whole new level. With its laceless upper construction, you have an ergonomic shape, while the breathable materials gives you the support and flexibility you need. The comfort sockliner, meanwhile, provides all-day cushioning. Add to that the classic PUMA logo and you have a pair of sneakers that are ideal for everyday wear.
PRODUCT DETAILS
Heel type: Flat
Shoe width: Wide fit
Shoe pronation: Neutral
Heel-to-toe-drop: 8 mm
Low boot construction
Slip-on upper construction
SoftFoam+ sockliner for cushioning and comfort
Textile upper
Zoned rubber outsole
PUMA cat logo at back.

Product Name: New Balance 373 Lifestyle Sneakers
Description:
Product DescriptionUnisex sneakers from the classic 373 series.
The upper is made of natural leather, synthetic materials and mesh.
The midsole is filled with soft EVA foam that provides good cushioning when hitting hard surfaces.
The firm and durable rubber sole with a classic pattern guarantees optimal adhesion to the surface and high comfort.
Unisex sneakers from the 373 series will do the job for everyday wear, you can create a casual outfit.

Description:
Product DescriptionThe BB80 series are New Balance's lifestyle, basketball-inspired sneakers for everyday wear.
The upper is made from a combination of leather and synthetic materials.
The durable rubber sole is characterized by good adhesion to the surface, resistance to mechanical damage and excessive wear during walking. The appearance of
the New Balance BB80 sneakers mainly refers to the iconic 550 and 480 series .
Footwear for her and for him will perfectly complement women's and men's lifestyle clothing .

PRODUCT STORY
